title: Wanting to trade T202 cobb for Cobb
author: milkit1

posts.post_title: Wanting to trade T202 cobb for Cobb
posts.post_content:
I have a beater Fast Work at Third T202 Cobb. Has some creases and a bit of back damage but should grade. Looking to trade for either of the following:

A Desperate Slide Cobb/O'Leary
Good Play at Third - Cobb/Moriarity

Can send scans. thanks!
